author: TravisEz13
body: update all docker files for POSIX syntax changes

comments.author: alexandair
comments.body: @TravisEz13 microsoft/nanoserver-insider image isn't on DockerHub yet, right?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @alexandair The images are public now on Docker Hub: [nanoserver-insider-powershell](https://hub.docker.com/r/microsoft/nanoserver-insider-powershell/)

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Docs are still coming up, I'm waiting on the docs.microsoft.com link, but if you want to use these please read the docs:  [Using Insider Container Images](https://github.com/Microsoft/Virtualization-Documentation/blob/live/virtualization/windowscontainers/quick-start/Using-Insider-Container-Images.md) and [Build and Run an Application](https://github.com/Microsoft/Virtualization-Documentation/blob/live/virtualization/windowscontainers/quick-start/Nano-RS3-.NET-Core-and-PS.md)

title: Add nanoserver insider dockerfile
